txt.en: ''One more day,' I'd say to myself each morning. 'I will turn around tomorrow.''
'And every night I'd realize that I hadn't turned around.'
Instance: A Restful Night
'So I thank you for that, [placeholder]!'
'Well, I am quite sleepy! Goodnight, my friend! Sleep well!'
Stand guard over the camp-site while Bingo sleeps
'It is getting dark. I will find a good place for us to make a fire, if you will find some tinder for it!'
You hear the sound of heavy footsteps approaching!

'Have a seat! We may be adventurers now, [placeholder], but there is no reason to always be on our feet! A rest is a rest, and we are deserving of it by now, wouldn't you say? We have come a good distance today, and the Lone-lands are behind us. The Trollshaws await!'

'Ah, I am most refreshed, and had quite a lovely dream. It put me in mind of being a young lad again, with the smell of breakfast drifting into my bedroom. I heard many folk rattling about outside my room, and the banging of pots and pans as the kitchen was being made ready.\n\n'Did you have any pleasant dreams, my friend?'
Collected suitable tinder ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

'It is a shame I woke up when I did. I would like to have experienced more of that lovely dream! Breakfast was nearly served, and a breakfast in the Shire is better than one anywhere else... including and especially the Trollshaws, I expect!'
DNT - Blah!
Your camp-fire has gone out
DNT - Blah!
Bingo has asked you to look for suitable tinder for building a fire.
'Ah, good morning, [placeholder]! You are awake already!'
Bingo must have chosen a good place for you to build a fire by now.
Bingo is sitting by the fire you built in the Trollshaws, ready to turn in for the night.
Talk to Bingo
Bingo is asleep, but someone needs to stay awake and alert to any dangers. That someone is you!
Collect suitable tinder ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
The hours of the night have passed... eventfully... and now Bingo has finally stirred.
Talk to Bingo by the camp-fire
Stand guard over the camp-site while Bingo sleeps
Talk to Bingo by the camp-fire
You hear the sound of tiny claws. More rats approach!
'I will find a place for our camp-fire if you collect suitable fire-wood, [placeholder].'
You have left the road and now Bingo wants to set up a camp-site for the night.
'Let's see....'
Build a camp-fire at the place Bingo has chosen
'How about right here?'
'Over here, [placeholder]! I found a good spot!'
'Perfect! That will keep the chill away!'
How is Bingo sleeping through all this noise?
You hear the sound of something slithering through the grass!
At last, the sun rises
The ground near your camp-fire is shifting and shaking!
'Do you know something?'
Bingo is ready to stop for the night, and wants to set up a camp just within the Trollshaws.
'I never expected to make it this far.'
Sit by the fire and listen to Bingo
